attributes.action: Increase the rate of carers allowance paid to carers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
carers do a valuable job in the community for which they are paid just fifty three pounds per week IN CARERS ALLOWANCE.
we call on the prime minister and his government to recognise the contribution carers make in society, and increase the weekly rate of carers allowance.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
